item.title: 2 Mattress and sofa left on road, 22nd September
item.description:
1 sofa was left on the road a few weeks ago and now 2 mattresses have been added. They are blocking the road and harbouring animals. This needs to be removed before more things are added creating a unauthorized obstructive dump site.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandy Road, Northumberland Heath, Erith, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Full bin, 22nd September
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Broken drain cover, 22nd September
item.description:
The drain cover isn’t fixed properly. It’s half up half down leaving a bit of a dropped hole which could be an issue if someone parked on it or trod on it or if an animal went near it. It was completely loose the other day but now is a bit wedged and we can’t get it back up to where it should be.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmhurst, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet
